meanings.definition: A son of one's stepmother or stepfather.
meanings.sent1: My stepbrother and I share a parent who is not biologically related to both of us.
meanings.sent2: I have a stepbrother who is older than me.
meanings.sent3: When my stepbrother accidentally put salt instead of sugar in the cake, we all had a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: Having a stepbrother is like gaining a new teammate in the family game of life.
meanings.sent5: The bond between a stepbrother and stepsister can be as strong as any sibling relationship.

meanings.definition: A male sibling who is the child of one's stepparent from a previous marriage.
meanings.sent1: My stepbrother and I have different biological fathers.
meanings.sent2: After my mom remarried, I gained a stepbrother who is very kind.
meanings.sent3: When my stepbrother tried to teach our dog to dance, it was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: In a blended family, a stepbrother can bring a new perspective and experiences.
meanings.sent5: Growing up with a stepbrother can lead to unique memories and shared adventures.
